title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Reflective Writing-Based Projects in Public Health Biology Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners develop reflective writing skills to apply public health biology concepts to community health issues.
Learners systematically analyze their learning process and propose improvement strategies using Gibbs’ Reflective Cycle framework.
Learners enhance the qualitative level of reflective writing through peer feedback and workshops.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
